name: BoneHealthAssessmentCPT
title: Bone Health Assessment CPT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values assesses a patients bone health risk),(Data Element Scope: Maps to the Diagnostic Study category of the QDM),(Inclusion Criteria: Including assessment of bone health using bone density, other bone studies to assess bone health),(Exclusion Criteria: Excluded are codes that do not meet inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Computed tomography, bone mineral density study, 1 or more sites, axial skeleton (eg, hips, pelvis, spine)
Bone density (bone mineral content) study, 1 or more sites; single photon absorptiometry
Bone density (bone mineral content) study, 1 or more sites; dual photon absorptiometry, 1 or more sites

contains.display: Computed tomography, bone mineral density study, 1 or more sites, axial skeleton (eg, hips, pelvis, spine)
Bone density (bone mineral content) study, 1 or more sites; single photon absorptiometry
Bone density (bone mineral content) study, 1 or more sites; dual photon absorptiometry, 1 or more sites
